name: Indomitable (LumikkoGames)
description:
Indomitable is a single-player deck-building card game in which you explore the galaxy in a starship, using skills and equipment to complete missions and battle foes. 

Set in the Union of Worlds, a loose federation of many worlds and species, the game follows the adventures of newly-minted captain Petra Salomen, commanding the light cruiser UFS Indomitable. A capable explorer and diplomat in her own right, she also depends on her officers' skills to accomplish missions. Choosing the right officers to build the right deck is often the difference between success and failure!

v0.38 is the first public build of this game, and there's a long road of development ahead before it is launched as a complete game. Your support and comments are appreciated and will do a lot to shape Indomitable's evolution!

For more about Indomitable and the Union of Worlds, visit playindomitable.com.
